name: n8n
title: n8n.io
payoff: Automate anything with AI and integrations
shortDescription: n8n is a workflow automation platform designed for technical teams to integrate AI and over 500 other applications seamlessly. Users can choose between coding or using a drag-and-drop interface for workflow creation. Example use cases include onboarding new employees, enriching security incident tickets, and generating customer insights from data.
pros: Flexible AI integration with over 500 apps
cons: May require technical knowledge to fully utilize
On-prem deployment may be complex for some

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Zapier
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular for easy integrations and automation

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Integromat
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Visual approach to automation and integration

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Automate.io
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on business workflows and CRM
